meanings.sent1: The unloosed bird flew freely in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The unloosed dog happily ran around the yard.
meanings.sent3: The unloosed balloon soared high above the trees.
meanings.sent4: The unloosed imagination knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unloosed prisoner felt the fresh air on his face for the first time in years.

meanings.definition: Freed from a fastening or attachment.
meanings.sent1: The unloosed rope dangled loosely from the tree branch.
meanings.sent2: The unloosed boat drifted gently on the calm lake.
meanings.sent3: The unloosed kite danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The unloosed grip allowed the door to swing open.
meanings.sent5: The unloosed chain clinked as it fell to the ground.
